## HITL points
- Stop for login/SSO/MFA/CAPTCHA; ask user to take over and wait for “Done”.
- Ask before any irreversible action (Submit/Complete/Attest/Finish).

## Recovery rules
- 

## When to stop and ask
- Any ambiguity about irreversible actions.
- Unexpected dialogs, permissions prompts, paywalls, or account selection issues.
